items.sentence: Everybody here knows that Tom is in Australia.
My mother never wanted to be just a housewife.
When I first came here, I didn\'t know anyone.
We should at least consider Tom\'s suggestion.
Tom didn\'t have permission to do what he did.
You don\'t want to know why I\'m here, do you?
When did Tom send in his passport application?
When did you realize that something was wrong?
When was the last time you massaged your legs?
A crowd of people gathered around the speaker.
Tom said that he wasn\'t going to wait for us.
Do you really think we don\'t have to do that?
You tricked Tom into coming here, didn\'t you?
Tom and Mary are planning to do that together.
I\'m the only one that can help Tom with that.
Tom makes it a rule to meditate every morning.
Tom doesn\'t know much about sailing, does he?
I\'m seriously considering filing for divorce.
I\'m so tired, I can hardly keep my eyes open.
I\'m sorry to hear about what happened to Tom.
